how to do it yammmmmmmmmmmm? i love this game, could you please tell me?

FOR MAC OS X LION (10.7)

- Download Winebottler (if you dont have winebottler installed)
http://winebottler.kronenberg.org/

1. Unzip
2. Right click to Show Package Content
3. Go to Contents/Resources/transgaming/c_drive/Rockstar Games
4. Move the "GTA San Andreas" Folder to your desktop
5. Right Click on "gta_sa.exe" and open it with Winebottler/Wine
6. Follow the steps and at the last part, allow Winebottler/Wine to change your resolution
7. WORKS!!
